law.catch_line: Application for retailer's or seller's permit to do business.

text.section: Every person presently engaged or desiring to engage in or conduct business as a retailer or seller within this state shall file with the department an application for a permit for each place of business.

Every application for a permit shall:
Be made upon a form prescribed by the department;
Set forth the name under which the applicant transacts or intends to transact business and the location of the place or places of business; and
Set forth other information as the department may require.
A written signature shall not be required if the applicant registers electronically.
